name: Zephyr (SleightOfHand)
description:
You have stumbled upon a weapon capable of liberating everyone trapped on board the Zephyr, held hostage by the malfunctioning AI.  Can you find the courage to do what must be done?

Zephyr is a game created by the team Sleight of Hand for the CMPUT 250 course of the University of Alberta's Game Development Certificate. It was created in RPG Maker by:

Ceegan Hale: Programmer

Noah Stobbe: Programmer

Hongji Zhang: Music and Sound Effects

Colette Nadon: Art and Design

Ian Schober: Art and Design

Alexis Graham: Writer/Producer
